mapper.insert: insert into t_lbcsbz ( lbcsbzid, pid, created, sortnumber, policy_type, lbcsbzyear,frelation, help_money,remark) values (#{lbcsbzid,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{created,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lbcsbzyear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{helpMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into t_contents
cid,
title,
slug,
created,
modified,
author_id,
type,
status,
tags,
categories,
hits,
comments_num,
allow_comment,
allow_ping,
allow_feed,
thumbImg,
content,

#{created,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{modified,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update t_contents
cid = #{record.cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
slug = #{record.slug,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{record.created,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modified = #{record.modified,jdbcType=INTEGER},
author_id = #{record.authorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tags = #{record.tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
categories = #{record.categories,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hits = #{record.hits,jdbcType=INTEGER},
comments_num = #{record.commentsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
allow_comment = #{record.allowComment,jdbcType=BIT},
allow_ping = #{record.allowPing,jdbcType=BIT},
allow_feed = #{record.allowFeed,jdbcType=BIT},
thumbImg = #{record.thumbimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{record.content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update t_contents set cid = #{record.cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, slug = #{record.slug,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{record.created,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modified = #{record.modified,jdbcType=INTEGER}, author_id = #{record.authorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tags = #{record.tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, categories = #{record.categories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hits = #{record.hits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comments_num = #{record.commentsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, allow_comment = #{record.allowComment,jdbcType=BIT}, allow_ping = #{record.allowPing,jdbcType=BIT}, allow_feed = #{record.allowFeed,jdbcType=BIT}, thumbImg = #{record.thumbimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{record.content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

update t_contents set cid = #{record.cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, slug = #{record.slug,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{record.created,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modified = #{record.modified,jdbcType=INTEGER}, author_id = #{record.authorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tags = #{record.tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, categories = #{record.categories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hits = #{record.hits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comments_num = #{record.commentsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, allow_comment = #{record.allowComment,jdbcType=BIT}, allow_ping = #{record.allowPing,jdbcType=BIT}, allow_feed = #{record.allowFeed,jdbcType=BIT}, thumbImg = #{record.thumbimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_poorusers
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{created,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
poor_reason = #{poorReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
outpoor_date = #{outpoorDate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
enjoy_policy = #{enjoyPolicy,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
fremark = #{fRemark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
lbcsbzremark = #{lbcsbzRemark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_lbcsbz set sortnumber = #{sortNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policy_type = #{policyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lbcsbzyear = #{lbcsbzyear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frelation = #{frelation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, help_money = #{helpMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where lbcsbzid = #{lbcsbzid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_lbcsbz set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, slug = #{slug,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{created,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modified = #{modified,jdbcType=INTEGER}, author_id = #{authorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tags = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, categories = #{categories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hits = #{hits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comments_num = #{commentsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, allow_comment = #{allowComment,jdbcType=BIT}, allow_ping = #{allowPing,jdbcType=BIT}, allow_feed = #{allowFeed,jdbcType=BIT}, thumbImg = #{thumbimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select FROM_UNIXTIME(created, '%Y年%m月') as date, count(*) as count from t_contents where type = 'post' and status = 'publish' group by date order by date desc
select a.* from t_contents a left join t_relationships b on a.cid = b.cid where b.mid = #{value} and a.status = 'publish' and a.type = 'post' order by a.created desc
